analyzed: byis pa rnams kyi yul du gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is the domain of fools.

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //

analyzed: dngos po ma yin dngos med min //

analyzed: tha dad gcig gi mtshan nyid min //

analyzed: zhes gsungs so // yang de'i ming gi rnam grangs ni //
translated: It is also said:
